page.title: 11BEAFORD - A GIRL GUIDE
page.content: Our Guide company is called the 1st. Dolton Guides, and is for girls aged 10 to 14. We have two patrol groups, named the Robins and the Blue-tits. Each patrol has a leader and a seconder. The uniform is brown or black shoes; black or blue skirts; blue hat; white socks; blue blouse; a necktie and a leather plaited woggle. We sometimes have a clothes inspection, and in our pockets we should have string, plasters, bandage, safety-pin, pencil, paper, handkerchief,scissors, needle and thread, and 10p. We play games and work for badges. So far I have the writer's badge, the challenge badge and the hostess badge. When we first join we have to promise "I promise that I will do my best, to do my duty to God, to serve the Queen, and help other people, and keep the Guide law."
